title: This Cult-y Japanese Cleansing Oil Is Half-Off at Ulta Today
text:
Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

Ulta’s 21 Days of Beauty Sale is still going strong and today DHC’s Deep Cleansing Oil is on sale. Our resident beauty guru, Rio Viera-Newton, first flagged this olive-oil-based cleanser for us back in 2018, and it’s a favorite in her friends’ skin-care group chat for those with dry, sensitive, or blackhead-prone skin. “Not only does this oil do a great job of removing makeup, it also happens to be one of the best products for getting rid of stubborn blackheads,” she assured us. And today’s the day to stock up on this hydrating Japanese face wash, since this cleansing oil is just $14 a bottle at Ulta, 50 percent off the list price of $28.
